thread.title: Watch: Major fire breaks out in Kerala, 15 shops gutted - Khaleej Times
thread.title_full: Watch: Major fire breaks out in Kerala, 15 shops gutted - Khaleej Times

author: Web Team
title: Watch: Major fire breaks out in Kerala, 15 shops gutted - Khaleej Times
text: Image credit: Mathrubhumi/Twitter No casualties have been reported in the fire. At least 15 shops were gutted as fire broke out in at the SM Street (Mittai Theruvu) in Kerala's Kozhikode on Wednesday. Over 10 fire tenders were at the spot trying to douse the fire. No casualties have been reported in the fire. Live updates: Major #fire accident in #MittaiTheruvu , #Kozhikode ; situation not under control; watch videos #Kerala https://t.co/35R8ulo5Wd - IBTimes India (@ibtimes_india) February 22, 2017 Reports say that the fire broke out at 11:30 am on Wednesday from the shop Modern Textiles. The shop was completely gutted in the fire while the flames engulfed more shops nearby. Watch LIVE VIDEO of KOzhikode SM Street Fire. No casualties. Collector in spot to assess situation https://t.co/ePk6NcfO48 #Kozhikode pic.twitter.com/8LQsgBppNB
